data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Prizren with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Prizren, Kosovo
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Prizren.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Prizren, Kosovo a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Prizren unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Gorani people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 645 believers living in the state of Prizren. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Prizren be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Prizren, Kosovo has a population of 331,700.

We estimate Prizren has 645 people who might know Jesus, 13,167 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 317,888 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 514 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Prizren who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
